buffs.description: Even if the Priest is at the Time Shop, 5 times speed buff starts every 10th floor. ( 5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5% )The chance for 5 times speed buff by Priests in the Time Shop cannot exceed 30%. Even when passing 10 floors with elves' Secret Skill (from 9th to 11th), the 5 times speed buff can start.
buffs.name: God's Blessing
